item.description: This Business Forum is designed as a self-help group for small business entrepreneurs who need other entrepreneurs as an informal advisory board. The Forum is not a networking organization. Furthermore, we require a commitment of time and continued attendance in order to make a difference in each other's businesses through group interaction. All discussions are confidential and require an implicit agreement of non-disclosure from each member.
item.how_to_find_us: Ask for the Framingham Small Business Meetup Group
item.name: June Business Meetup with Larry Chism as Presenter
